subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Landon Donovan, considered the greatest male player in the history of United States soccer, was cut from the team as Coach Jurgen Klinsmann trimmed his final roster to 23 players.
snippet: Landon Donovan, considered the greatest male player in the history of United States soccer, was cut from the team as Coach Jurgen Klinsmann trimmed his final roster to 23 players.
